name: Tomato
tips: Support with stakes, prune suckers regularly. Water at the base to avoid leaf diseases.

name: Basil
water_frequency: Daily in hot weather, every 2 days otherwise
tips: Pinch flowers to encourage leaf growth. Harvest regularly to promote bushier growth.

name: Rose
tips: Deadhead spent blooms, fertilize monthly during growing season. Mulch to retain moisture.

name: Cactus
sunlight: Bright indirect light, some direct sun
tips: Avoid overwatering, ensure drainage holes. Water less in winter months.

name: Orchid
water_frequency: Once a week, morning is best
tips: Mist leaves occasionally, avoid water on flowers. Repot every 2 years.

name: Mint
tips: Grows aggressively, consider container planting. Harvest regularly to encourage growth.

name: Lettuce
sunlight: 4-6 hours daily, partial shade in hot climates
tips: Harvest outer leaves first. Provide afternoon shade in hot weather to prevent bolting.

name: Lavender
water_frequency: Once a week, drought-tolerant once established
tips: Prune after flowering. Avoid overwatering, prefers dry conditions.

name: Succulent
tips: Water only when soil is completely dry. Provide good air circulation.

name: Pepper
tips: Support plants with stakes. Harvest peppers when fully colored for best flavor.
